channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Thousands Attend President Lai's Inauguration, Hope for Unity and Stability
item.description: Thousands of people traveled from around Taiwan and overseas to attend Lai Ching-te's presidential inauguration in Taipei. TaiwanPlus spoke to some of the people in the audience.

item.title: Analysis: Challenges Facing Taiwan's New Cabinet
item.description: President Lai Ching-te's new Cabinet will lead the country forward in major policy areas including national security, economic development and social welfare. TaiwanPlus takes a lo

item.title: China Military Activity Around Taiwan Low Following President Lai's Inauguration
item.description: With Lai Ching-te officially sworn in as Taiwan's new president, attention turns to how China will react. Jaime Ocon has been monitoring military activity around the country.

item.title: New President Lai Calls on China To Stop Military Intimidation of Taiwan
item.description: Taiwan's new President Lai Ching-te used his inauguration address to tell China to stop its military intimidation of Taiwan.
